chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_20
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
the ANC mothers are made aware of all the entitlements under the JSSK 
program like: Free referral and transport to the hospital and drop back, free drugs and diagnostics, Free 
diet. This will ensure that out of pocket expenditure does not happen.
1.1.5 Home delivery: 
1.1.5.1 CHO should ensure that a proper birth plan is made, and the pregnant woman is counselled to have 
an institutional delivery.
